biotools.summary: Microbial Phenomics Information Extractor (MicroPIE) is a natural language processing application that uses a robust supervised classification algorithm (Support Vector Machine) to identify characters from sentences in prokaryotic taxonomic descriptions, followed by a combination of algorithms applying linguistic rules with groups of known terms to extract characters as well as character states.

bioschemas.name: MicroPIE
bioschemas.summary: Microbial Phenomics Information Extractor (MicroPIE) is a natural language processing application that uses a robust supervised classification algorithm (Support Vector Machine) to identify characters from sentences in prokaryotic taxonomic descriptions, followed by a combination of algorithms applying linguistic rules with groups of known terms to extract characters as well as character states.
